description: I'm .Net Developer from Ho Chi Minh, Viet Nam, working in web development. I enjoy turning complex problems into simple, beautiful and intuitive designs. My job is to build your website so that it is functional and user-friendly but at the same time attractive. Moreover, I add personal touch to your product and make sure that is eye-catching and easy to use. My aim is to bring across your message and identity in the most creative way.

education.school: University of Economics Ho Chi Minh City

skills.name: Programming language
skills.description: C#, ASP.NET MVC, ASP Classic, ASP.Net Core MVC, Entity framework with the UnitTest: NUnit + Moq

skills.name: Development
skills.description: Experience in using Devexpress, HTML, CSS (Bootstrap, Jquery),LINQ

responsibilities: Participate in the analysis of ERP System
Prepare user requirement, workflow, data requirement, and functional specification document to be handed over to the technical teams
Provide assistance during the test and implementation phase
Design data modeling and application mock-up/wireframe
Provide support for analysis of production issue to fix the functional defect
Planning to do the assigned work in sprint
Develop features from request from BA or manager
Support and handle problems during development & Deployment
Research new technological solutions to resolve work
